title: Therapist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Pick a player every night to have a therapy session with.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-You will discover if they're a Killing, Support, Investigative or Protection role, but will not know their faction.
-All roles that do not enter into any of those categories, such as Mafia Deception, are assumed to be into the Support category unless stated otherwise.
-Framed appears as Killing

desc:
Post 254
*So, what is troubling you today?*
